meanings.definition: A person who has an excessive interest in or admiration of themselves.
meanings.sent1: Some narcissists spend hours admiring themselves in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: Narcissists often talk about themselves and their achievements.
meanings.sent3: The group of narcissists at the party only discussed their own accomplishments.
meanings.sent4: Her vanity was so extreme, it was as if she belonged to a secret society of narcissists.
meanings.sent5: The narcissists in the room could not stop gazing at their reflections.

meanings.definition: A person who is overly self-involved and lacks empathy for others.
meanings.sent1: Narcissists rarely consider how their actions affect those around them.
meanings.sent2: It can be challenging to have a meaningful conversation with narcissists.
meanings.sent3: The narcissists in the office never offered to help their colleagues.
meanings.sent4: Her selfishness was so evident, she was like the queen of all narcissists.
meanings.sent5: The lack of empathy shown by the narcissists was truly disheartening.
